title: Asymmetric relation
summary: In mathematics, an asymmetric relation is a binary relation R {\displaystyle R} on a set X {\displaystyle X} where for all a , b âˆˆ X , {\displaystyle a,b\in X,} if a {\displaystyle a} is related to b {\displaystyle b} then b {\displaystyle b} is not related to a . {\displaystyle a.} [1]
